title: Sacred Lotus of the East
medium: drypoint, engraving, and electric tool work on Rives BFK paper (facing _Soaring Clouds_ by Huang O, translated by Kenneth Rexroth and Lin Chung)
dimensions:
plate: 45.7 x 30.5 cm (18 x 12 in.)
page size: 52 x 35.5 cm (20 1/2 x 14 in.)
creditline: Gift of Jim Dine, in Honor of the 50th Anniversary of the National Gallery of Art
